bibl.title: Findspot Known: Treasures from Excavation Sites in Egypt in the Museum für Byzantinische Kunst, Berlin.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.note: Arsinoe / Krokodilopolis / Medinet el-Fayum. - Antinoupolis. Abu Mina. - Otto Rubensohn's excavations in Ashmunein, Abusir el-Meleq, Elephantine, Batn Harit and Umm el-Barakat. - Ulrich Wilcken's expedition to Ahnasiya / Heracleopolis Magna. - Guy Brunton's excavations in Mostagedda and Matmar. - Richard Lepsius' expedition to Wadi Ghazal. - Individual objects from various sites. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Cäcilia Fluck, Findspot Known: Treasures from Excavation Sites in Egypt in the Museum für Byzantinische Kunst, Berlin.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 21 (2014) pp. 1-30, 16 pll. n./bl. et coul.

Arsinoe / Krokodilopolis / Medinet el-Fayum. - Antinoupolis. Abu Mina. - Otto Rubensohn's excavations in Ashmunein, Abusir el-Meleq, Elephantine, Batn Harit and Umm el-Barakat. - Ulrich Wilcken's expedition to Ahnasiya / Heracleopolis Magna. - Guy Brunton's excavations in Mostagedda and Matmar. - Richard Lepsius' expedition to Wadi Ghazal. - Individual objects from various sites. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
